author: paul richman
comment: It won't load on my Tag Heuer Connected watch.  Could this be caused by the Intel processor inside the  Tag? This is the only face that refuses to download.  Fix to get 5 stars.

reply.author: magic watchface
reply.content: Dear Paul, really sorry for this inconvenience. We would like to know have you tried other our magic faces yet like "Ticker" ? Dose it work ? We saw your comment about T2-iron as well. All magic faces support all android wear devices, we think it should be a connecting issue ,not  about Intel CPU.Please Reboot ur phone and re-install app again,Pls

title: I love the looks of this but...

author: joe a
comment: I'll give it a 5 once we have the option to change the color for it. I'd rather have blue than purple.
title: color change?
